propel.core.utils
Class EscapingUtils

java.lang.Object
  propel.core.utils.EscapingUtils

public final class EscapingUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Provides utility functionality for escaping and un-escaping text-based data e.g. XML, HTML and URLs

Method Detail

toXml

public static java.lang.String toXml(java.lang.String text)
Escapes a String for use in XML Strings e.g. < becomes &lt;

toHtml

public static java.lang.String toHtml(java.lang.String text)
Escapes a String for use in HTML Strings e.g. @ becomes &#064; The idea is to avoid use of scripts embedded in the HTML.

toUrl

public static java.lang.String toUrl(java.lang.String text)
Escapes a String for use in URLs e.g. # becomes %23

fromXml

public static java.lang.String fromXml(java.lang.String xml)
Unescapes an XML String e.g. &lt; becomes <

fromHtml

public static java.lang.String fromHtml(java.lang.String html)
Unescapes an HTML String e.g. &#064; becomes @

fromUrl

public static java.lang.String fromUrl(java.lang.String url)
Unescapes a URL String e.g. %23 becomes #
